name: Bathory - The Bloody Countess
description: Stop the blood rite before something darker than the myth itself comes to live in Bathory: The Bloody Countess, a haunted hidden object adventure game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98, XP, Vista, 7 Processor: 800 Mhz Memory: 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 7.0

reviews.review_text: This isn't an Artifex Mundi game, but they did well in there own way and there is room for improvement. Bathory 2? :)
